sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Map Capability to Builder and Attribute</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Update capability field for existing records for attributes.
var attributeGr = new GlideRecord("sys_one_extend_definition_attribute");

attributeGr.query();

while(attributeGr.next()) {
	attributeGr.setValue("capability", attributeGr.definition.capability);
	attributeGr.update();
}


// Update capability field for existing records for builder capability.
var builderCapGr = new GlideRecord("sys_one_extend_builder_capability");

builderCapGr.query();

while(builderCapGr.next()) {
	builderCapGr.setValue("capability", builderCapGr.definition.capability);
	builderCapGr.update();
}
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-03 23:25:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1704b26a53112110c271ddeeff7b1207</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Map Capability to Builder and Attribute</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Glide OneExtend" source="com.glide.one_extend">dc98175b47220210cd4e1ce4316d4324</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_1704b26a53112110c271ddeeff7b1207</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-03 23:47:09</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Map Capability to Builder and Attribute
